problem_statement: The accessServiceListDal in a banking app uses O(n) table scans causing latency issues. Implement Cuckoo hash for O(1) per-key lookups and PQ encryption for cache entries.
FAIL_TO_PASS: CuckooHashTable should provide O(1) get operations
CuckooHashTable should handle collisions via displacement
CuckooHashTable should support delete operation in O(1)
accessServiceListDal should use cache for O(1) gets
Cache get operations should complete in <1us average
CuckooHashTable should resolve collisions via displacement
CuckooHashTable should not lose data on update
Dual hash functions should achieve high insertion success rate
accessServiceListDal create should add to cache
accessServiceListDal update should invalidate and update cache
accessServiceListDal delete should remove from cache
accessServiceListDal get all should cache individual records
PASS_TO_PASS: PQEncryption should detect tampering (quantum cache poisoning)
Cache should maintain O(1) with large number of entries
